Christina Ricci strips completely NAKED for new drama series Z: The Beginning of Everything The Addams Family star is all grown up now and she's not afraid to show it Share Comments By Vicki Newman 14:46, 1 FEB 2017 Celebs Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Watch the dramatic Hacksaw Ridge trailer Watch this video again Watch Next Holly and Phil get the giggles over a promo they 0:41 Watch the trailer for BBC's Hospital 0:40 Incredible moment kids go fishing and catch a CRO 1:24 Aleppo's 'Twitter girl' Bana al-Abed asks Donald 0:22 Teenager jumps EIGHT red lights in 90mph chase wi 7:05 Fisherman gets up close and personal with a GREAT 0:28 Extraordinary drone footage shows off-limits New 1:48 Kris Marshall's last series of Death in Paradise 0:15 Beyonce reveals she is pregnant with twins 0:40 Video will play in Trailer for Z: The Beginning of Everything Share this video Watch Next celebs We all remember Christina Ricci as the delightfully-creepy Wednesday Addams, but she's all grown up now and she isn't afraid to show it!
The former child star strips completely naked for her latest role.
She'll perform full frontal scenes in new Amazon Prime drama, Z: The Beginning of Everything.
Christina, 36, stars as Zelda Sayre Fitzgerald, the wife of The Great Gatsby writer F. Scott Fitzgerald, and bares (almost) all as she hides her modesty beneath a pubic wig.
Read More Where are the Addams Family now? They're not as mysterious or spooky anymore Christina Ricci hides her modesty underneath a pubic wig (Photo: Amazon Prime) Zelda is attempting to get the attention of the acclaimed author in the racy scene which is sure to get pulses racing.
It sees her burst through the door wearing nothing but a pair of high heels, in front of a room full of shocked onlookers.
She told Yahoo Style: "I almost don’t feel like it isn’t fully nude because the merkin is kind of like wearing a bikini. I don’t know that I would ever go just full on vag. I feel like I’d have to do underwear.
"It’s a merkin. It feels like you have underwear on."
She bursts through a door completely naked in the racy scene (Photo: Amazon Prime) Christina played Wednesday in the Addams Family (Photo: Rex) She added: "I just make sure that they shoot it first thing so that I can eat afterwards. I’ve done a lot of nude scenes in my life and I feel like at this point, it’s no secret what I look like naked. You can Google me."
Christina shared a picture of her pubic wig - as well as the one for her head - with her followers on Instagram
With it attached to the front of a wig stand, it looks almost like a beard, but it's definitely not designed to be worn on her face.
Alongside it Quote: : "Two wigs today! Guess which one goes where?", followed by a winking emoji.
Christina shared a pic of her pubic wig (Photo: riccigrams/Instagram) "Hahahaha. That's a lot of bush!!," said one fan.
And Quote: : "I'm confused is one the carpet and the other the drapes?"
Someone else said: " nothing like a sexy woman and a huge Merkin Muff!"
Christina said she had brushed aside her own insecurities ahead of the nude scene, saying it's not like being a model when "you're supposed to look great all the time".
